Description 
-------------
 This project made for clean Thailand address from message/text

Feature 
-------------

##### Extract
- extract_api

Installing
----------
    pip install thaiaddressclean

Change log 
-------------
#### Version

##### v0.0.1 
- **[2024/11/7]** Initial clean and autofill address in Thailand
